desc: Shop over 250 tea blends, tea gifts, recipes and teaware from Yum Cha. Loose leaf black tea, green tea, herbal tea, white tea, chai tea, oolong tea, rooibos tea, yerba mate! Seasonal Tea, fall tea, winter tea, summer tea and spring tea. Orders usually ship in 3-5 business days. Tea purchases over $50 get free shipping

layout.text: We have a bee on our logo
